function.name: dotnetVsTest
function.description: Adds a [.NET vstest step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET VSTest @see DotnetVsTestStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to test assemblies. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: excludedPaths
param.description: Specify paths to excluded test assemblies. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: test.filter
param.description: The filter type used while test run

param.name: test.names
param.description: Specify the list of test names to run.

param.name: test.testCaseFilter
param.description: Run tests that match the given expression.

param.name: framework
param.description: The target .NET Framework version to be used for test execution.

param.name: test.settingsFile
param.description: The path to the run settings configuration file.

param.name: test.retry.maxRetries
param.description: Rerun failed tests until they pass or until the maximum number of attempts is reached.

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for dotnet vstest.

param.name: vstest.InIsolation
param.description: Whether TeamCity should run tests in an isolated process

param.name: singleSession
param.description: Whether TeamCity should run tests in a single session

param.name: platform
param.description: Target platform architecture to be used for test execution @see Platform

param.name: required.sdk
param.description: .NET SDK versions separated by semicolon to be required on agents.

example.description: Runs [`dotnet vstest`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-vstest) command to run selected tests by names from the specified assemblies
example.code: dotnetVsTest { assemblies = "path\to\assemblies\*.dll" excludedAssemblies = "path\to\assemblies\ExcludedTests.dll" version = DotnetVsTestStep.VSTestVersion.V17 filter = testName { names = """ Test0 Test1 Test2 """.trimIndent() } settingsFile = "MyProjectTestsSettings.runsettings" logging = DotnetVsTestStep.Verbosity.Normal runInIsolation = true platform = DotnetVsTestStep.Platform.x64 }
